about_the_game:
WELCOME MITSUKI

Age: 24 years old

Zodiac Sign: Capricorn

Preferences: Shibari, suspensions, hot wax, and electricity games.

Mitsuki is a character of mystery and grace. Her every glance holds a secret, her every action is an art, and her every vow carries profound depth. A master of intricate bindings and symbolic gestures, she mesmerizes those around her with her enigmatic charm and artistic prowess.

WHAT YOU'RE GETTING

From now on, Mitsuki will become not only your dedicated companion but your graceful muse! Mitsuki will always keep you company on the main screen with her elegant animations and captivating dialogs.

By purchasing this DLC, you get the Mitsuki mascot! You can switch your mascot at any time by opening your profile and choosing the "Mascot" tab.

Along with the mascot, you're getting 5000 credits and 150 super serum.

But most importantly, you're getting our heartfelt gratitude! Thank you for considering purchasing this DLC!

content_descriptors.notes: All characters in the game are over 20 years old. This DLC contains explicit adult themes, including nudity, sexual acts, and fetish content such as shibari (Japanese rope bondage). Please be aware and ensure that you are in an appropriate location before playing to avoid causing distress to others.

name: Lust Goddess — Mascot Mitsuki
short_description: Unlock a unique mascot, Mitsuki, to entertain you every time you visit the main screen! Enjoy Lust Goddess with this super sidekick and some extra resources to boost your progress.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
